card.name: Star Lead, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command Dragon/Revolutionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, your opponent can only untap one of their creatures at the start of their turn.

property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Race
property.value: Magic Command/Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {INVASION}-Water command (When one of your Water command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 4 cards. Then, your opponent chooses 2 cards from your hand at random and puts them on the bottom of your deck in any order.
